name: Desolate Dark
description:
The rules are simple.

If you run into a wall, you DIE.

You cannot see where the walls are.

You must use light energy from a limited reserve to show you the way forward, using one of four luminous abilities.

You can pick up energy cells to refill your energy.

You can also refill your energy by reaching the end of the area, which will take you to a new, larger one.

Make sure you check the controls before playing, as they are not given in game.
